receive() - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.Communicator
Receives an object
receive() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.SocketCommunicator
receives an object
refresh() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.GamePanel
Wrapper for the refresh task, it adds the task to be executed into the event dispatch thread
refreshActions() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.ActionPanel
Asks the server (through a chain of responsability panel -> mediator -> client -> communicator -> server) what are the available actions for the player and creates the buttons for it
refreshItems() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.ItemPanel
Asks the server for the available items for the player and adds a new ItemLabel for each one
refreshItems() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.PlayerPanel
refreses the items
refreshPosition() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.SpaceshipPanel
Method to set the new current position of the player, which we indicated with a red glow over the sector.
refreshRoundNumber() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.PlayerPanel
refreshes the round number label to the current round number
removeGame(Model) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.GamesManager
 
removePlayer(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.map.Sector
removes a single player from the sector
removeTopic(Model) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.Broker
Method to delete a game from the ones the broker expects updates.
RequestMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons
Defines the object that is sent through the socket from the client to the server.
RequestMessage(UUID, RequestType, String, String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.RequestMessage
Constructor for the message
RequestType - Enum in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons
Simple enumeration with the different kinds of requests a client can send
ResponseMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons
Is the class of the object that the server sends to the client to communicate the outcome of the command it send, together with a message when needed (for example: send cause of negative outcome, result of query)
ResponseMessage(boolean) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.ResponseMessage
Constructor for the response message without a string
ResponseMessage(boolean, String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.ResponseMessage
Constructor for the response message with both the boolean and the string
RMIStarter - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server
The RMI side of the server, it publishes on the registry the remote interface for the rmi client to use.
RMIStarter(int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.RMIStarter
Constructor for the thread of the rmi server
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.client.ClientSocketSubThread
Initialize the communication, then keep waiting for updates
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.ClientHandler
Receives a request from the client, asks the interpreter to computer a response, sends it to the client and closes the communicator
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.RMIStarter
Binds the game manager remote to the registry
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.SocketServer
while the thread is running it waits for new connections from clients
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.SubscriberHandler
sends the message to the client
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.TurnTimer.ForceEndTurn
When it is run it first warns the player to complete its turn soon other, then if after another minute he has not played (meaning that the task has not been interrupted) it procedes to set its state to disconnected, it warns all the other players and from this moment on the player will not play another turn (Its state changes to DISCONNECTED)
